title: Crowds flock to first-ever 24/7 Vaccination Centre at Vihara Maha Devi Park

title: Britain to offer COVID booster shots for 32 m

snippet: It applies to indoor dining, gyms and indoor entertainment venues. De Blasio said Monday he was making "a strong recommendation" that everyone wear a mask in public indoor settings but stressed that the city's "overwhelming strategic thrust" remained getting more people vaccinated.

title: The Latest: 1st cruise ship in Puerto Rico since pandemic

title: 74 COVID-19 deaths reported: Death toll surges to 4,645

title: The Latest: NYC: Vaccination proof for indoor dining, gyms
snippet: NEW YORK — New York City will soon require proof of COVID-19 vaccinations for indoor activities. Mayor Bill de Blasio announced the move Tuesday, the first big city in the U.S. to impose such restrictions.

title: The Latest: Union auto workers return to wearing masks
snippet: DETROIT — Unionized auto workers in the U.S. will go back to wearing masks in all factories, offices and warehouses starting Wednesday because of the spreading delta coronavirus variant. The decision by a task force of representatives from General Motors,
